duties_responsibilities.duty: Use concrete cutting and breaking equipment for city streets, curb & gutter, and sidewalks maintenance.
Lead concrete-related projects including removal and installation of sidewalk, curbing, gutter, signage, and storm water system.
Oversee contract labor and construction projects, and provide input in the development of contracts.
Operate specialized equipment for snow removal, plowing, sweeping, and cleaning streets.
Assist in storm control activities, asphalt paving/patching, traffic markings, stormwater maintenance, lighting, and signage.
Utilize IT equipment to enter, retrieve, review, and modify data for work order database, email, and other computer programs.

education_certification.credential: DOT physical card with the ability to obtain a Class B Commercial Driver’s License with Air Brake and potentially Tanker endorsement.
